Marisa Pavan Partner: Who Is Jean-Pierre Aumont?: Italian actress and Oscar-nominated actress, Marisa Pavan has passed away.

The news of her demise was announced by the author of her 2021 biography, Margaux Soumoy in a Facebook post.

Marisa Pavan Partner: Who Is Jean-Pierre Aumont?

We do not have any information on whether Marisa Pavan was married at the time of her death.

On 27 March 1956, the late actress married French actor, Jean-Pierre Aumont in Santa Barbara, California, and the couple remained together until Jean-Pierre died in 2001. He was 90

Marisa Pavan died on Wednesday, December 6, 2023, at her home in Gassin, France. She was 91 and no cause was given making it unknown whether she battled any form of illness or died through an accident.

Born on June 19, 1932, Pavan developed a passion for acting at a younger age, and was consistent throughout her career, becoming one of the most sought-after actresses.

She appeared in several films such as; Diane (1956), The Man in the Gray Flannel Suit (1956), The Midnight Story (1957), and John Paul Jones (1959)

Pavan became a household name following her role as Rosa, the daughter of an Italian seamstress, Anna Magnani in the 1955 drama; âThe Rose Tattooâ

Her performance in âThe Rose Tattooâ earned her an Oscar nomination for Best Supporting Actress, an Academy Award nomination, and won a Golden Globe Award.
